EmailTemplate.description: Book a meeting with a DCSM to discuss SEO best practices, platform utilization guidance, and personalized strategy insights to enhance the Brand+ client experience post-launch.
EmailTemplate.name: Brand+: DCSM Post-Launch Strategy Call
EmailTemplate.subject: Next steps: Let’s set up a time to meet
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Account.Contact__c},
Congratulations on your new website! We’re thrilled to have you onboard and excited to partner with you in elevating your real estate brand.
To help you get the most out of your new Luxury Presence platform, products and website, we’d love to schedule a strategy session with one of our Client Success Managers. During this call, we’ll walk you through:
Utilizing your Luxury Presence dashboard and key products. Best practices in SEO and content strategy tailored to real estate. Answering any questions and addressing initial goals.
To book your session, simply click here and choose a time that works best for you.
We’re excited to start this journey with you and look forward to supporting your growth and success!
Best, Luxury Presence Client Success
